price: Dan Kami telah memberikan kepada mereka di antara tanda-tanda kekuasaan (Kami) sesuatu yang di dalamnya terdapat nikmat yang nyata 1376.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: 1376.  Maksud "tanda-tanda kekuasaan Allah" ialah seperti naungan awan, turunnya manna dan salwā, terpancarnya air dari batu, dan belahnya Laut Merah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
